snippet.title: Victoria 3 - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://pdxint.at/3fvxaV7
Sign up: https://www.victoria3game.com/#subscribe

Shape a grand tomorrow in Victoria 3, Paradox's deepest society simulation ever. Lead your population through the age of exhibitions and steam engines in a grand strategy game about a century of revolution and innovation.

Follow us:
Facebook - http://facebook.com/VictoriagamePDX
Twitter - https://twitter.com/PDXVictoria
Discord - https://discord.gg/kGw9DkzyZj
Forums - https://pdxint.at/3oD4XQb
Official Website - https://pdxint.at/3hCLBcA
Steam - https://pdxint.at/3fvxaV7


Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

ParadoxExtra - http://youtube.com/ParadoxExtra
Gameplay of our video games, convention coverage, and other fun things from Paradox!

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK2, EU4, HOI4, Stellaris, and Imperator.
